title: Remco Evenepoel, stone in the shoe of Jumbo-Visma at the Vuelta a España
content:
'This Vuelta still has a long way to go': Evenepoel has so far been resilient against Kuss, Roglič, Vingegaard – how long can he last?

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel, stone in the shoe of Jumbo-Visma at the Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
